MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 24-NOV-2020 22:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer, affecting properties in Kirkcolm and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have carried out fault finding investigations and network checks at the local substation, further investigations will now be completed on the overhead line network in the area and we now expect your supply to be restored by 10.00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:29pm on the 24th November 2020.
